core_constraints.name: constant_elevation_path
core_constraints.description: The lava moat must lie entirely on a single elevation level (z = constant).

core_constraints.name: west_to_east_connectivity
core_constraints.description: The path must connect the western border (x=0) to the eastern border (x=w).

core_constraints.name: path_on_terrain_surface
core_constraints.description: The path must lie on the piecewise-linear terrain surface defined by the triangulation.

core_constraints.name: linear_interpolation_validity
core_constraints.description: Elevation at non-vertex points is determined by linear interpolation within triangles; path must respect this.

objective.description: Minimize the Euclidean length of the constant-elevation path connecting west to east borders.

invariant.name: level_set_connectivity
invariant.description: For a fixed elevation z, the set of points on the terrain with elevation z forms a collection of curves (level sets); solution exists iff some level set connects west to east.
